title: Bring back URF for good
body: i was playing URF when it realised earlier and i liked it, i reckon it would be played a lot if it was brought back  for good :)

replies.body: no it would get boring, it is good having it in quick bursts so it remains fun
Just bring it back permanently. You dont have to select to play it.
It's a sometimes thing, like chocolate, you keep eating all the time and you'll get fat, same if you keep playing urf
